one_reviews_text: Please, crossplay between Quest and Rift. Pay 2 time for same game it’s not good idea

So far I have already spent a lot of time buying games to be let down or want a refund. This game is NOT one of those games , no it is a game that is a blast to play and easy to get into . Love the gameplay mechanics and to be honest, its one of the better strategy games out.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-gjEqgwVj0E (Please Note: Links might not work from Oculus so please search YouTube for 'Paradise Decay VR Skyworld Kingdom Brawl)

My Quick Thoughts:
A polished strategy experience where you command your troops with the ability to craft and upgrade cards.
Another great game from the creators of Arizona Sunshine.
